DocumentParseHTMLUnsafe.summary: The parseHTMLUnsafe() static method of the object is used to parse a string of HTML, which may contain declarative shadow roots, in order to create a new instance.

remarks.para: The suffix "Unsafe" in the method name indicates that, while <script> elements are not evaluated during parsing, the method does not sanitize other potentially unsafe XSS-relevant input.
The resulting Document will have a content type of "text/html", a character set of UTF-8, and a URL of "about:blank"

- for parsing HTML or XML into a DOM tree
-
